caption:
As 2024 comes to a close, we're rounding up the top cut, color and style trends of the year. Here we spotlight cuts! 

☕ Bangs: Sabrina Carpenter's fringe bangs have been a big hit this year, but we’ve also seen a resurgence in curtain bangs, birkin bangs and micro bangs! Clients are looking for an easy way to accessorize their hair looks, and bangs have been the way to go! 

🧚 Short Cuts: Whether it's pixies, bob, lobs or shags, clients are embracing the big chop. 

🦋 Layered Cuts: Clients are loving hair with dimension and volume, which means layered haircuts have been all the rage!

🔗 For tutorials to bring these trending looks to life plus more color and style trends, read our November/December issue by clicking the link in our bio.

#hairtrends #fringebangs #shorthaircuts #layeredhaircuts #butterflycut
